summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department; authorizing the sale of real property, divided into four parcels, in King County, Washington, commonly known as "Linden Avenue Parcels" (PM\#260419-2-301, 260419-2-302A and 302B; 260419-2-303) by negotiated sale to abutting owners or by public bid; authorizing the Superintendent of the City Light Department to offer said property for sale, accept the best offers to purchase and to execute Quit Claim Deeds; designating the disposition of sales proceeds; and ratifying and confirming prior actions.
